availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Native of Kentucky. Worked as a printer in Warren County in 1850 editing the Bowling Green Standard. Candidate for the Kentucky House of Representatives in 1853 for Warren County. Later worked as a lawyer in Simpson County in 1860.

Spouse: Caroline Smith
Children: Thomas Smith, William Smith, Richard Smith, Sarah A Smith,

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Simpson County, page 134.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Warren County, District 1, page 57.
The Louisville Daily Courier, "Selected Items on all Sorts of Subjects," June 17, 1853, page 2.
